Bound Famulus.Description: The vampire can form a bond with an animal facilitating the use of other Animalism powers.

Sense the Beast.Description: The vampire can sense the beast within other vampires, mortals and supernatural creatures.

Atavism.Description: The vampire can cause an animal to temporarily revert to their primal instincts, forcing them to attack anyone nearby or to flee the scene.

Feral Whispers.Description: The vampire can summon and communicate with an animal.

Animal Succulence.Description: The vampire can slake additional Hunger by feeding on animals.

Quell the Beast.Description: The vampire can cow mortals and can pull vampiric targets out of frenzy.

Unliving Hive.Description: Amalgam Obfuscate 2. The vampire can become a permanent home for swarms of flies or cockroaches or similar small creatures.

Subsume the Spirit.Description: The vampire can mentally take over an animal target.

Animal Dominion.Description: The vampire can perfectly direct swarms and flocks of animals.

Drawing Out the Beast.Description: The vampire can cause a target to immediately frenzy.

Beast Walk.Description: Hop from animal body to animal body

Deep Song.Description: Influence the emotional state of listeners with a song

Eye of the Szlachta.Description: Possess the body of a ghoul

Gap of Ages.Description: As Feral Whispers, except give commands to an animal and all of its descendants

Pact with Animals.Description: Gain bestial qualities from the blood of an animal

Quell the Herd.Description: As Quell the Beast but on groups of mortals or animals

Sense the Savage Way.Description: Share the senses of an animal

Shared Soul.Description: Meld minds with an animal and probe their memories

Shepherd's Innocence.Description: Gain the trust and attention of all animals

Song in the Dark.Description: Summon huge worms from the deep earth to shift the earth, creating caverns or earthquakes

Species Speech.Description: As Feral Whispers, except speak with all animals of a species present

Tainted Oasis.Description: Taint a land so that animals that feed from it become stronger and loyal

Tier of Souls.Description: Gain memories or powers from the blood you drink

Beast Shard.Description: Split up your Beast and instill shards in others, making them more prone to Frenzy and making them more susceptible to your Disciplines

Conquer the Beast.Description: Enter and leave your Frenzy at will

Master's Voice.Description: As Species Speech, except speak to all animals regardless of species

Send the Eighth Plague.Description: Summon beasts to devastate the harvests of a land

Stampede.Description: Induce animalistic panic in a group of mortals

Twist the Feral Will.Description: Force an animal to obey you without speaking or remaining near it

Crimson Fury.Description: Your blood causes Frenzy in any who taste it and diablerists must fight off your Beast

Mass Summons.Description: Summon all animals within miles of you

Twin Spirits.Description: Possess an animal's body without losing control of your own

Unchain the Ferocious Beast.Description: Cause a target's Beast to tear at them from within

Eyes of the Forest.Description: Meld to the earth and use the animals in the forest as eyes.

Flesh Bond.Description: Physically meld with one or more animals

Free the Beast Within.Description: Enter a controlled Frenzy and gain several powers from the Beast

Unchain the Beast.Description: Cause a target's Beast to tear at them from within

Army of Beasts.Description: Control all animals within a mile

Heightened Senses.Description: The vampire can add their Auspex rating to their perception checks.

Sense the Unseen.Description: The vampire can detect things that are supernaturally invisible

Obeah.Description: Soothes the psychological turmoil of the vampire's subject.

Premonition.Description: The vampire can receive visions and hints about what is about to happen.

Share the Senses.Description: The vampire can sense through the senses of another kindred or mortal.

Spirit's Touch.Description: The vampire can touch an inanimate object to sense the emotional residue from when the object was last used

Clairvoyance.Description: The vampire can gather information from an entire city-block at once.

Possession.Description: Amalgam of Dominate 3. The vampire can take over the body of a mortal.

Telepathy.Description: The vampire can project their thoughts into the mind of another kindred or mortal or read surface level thoughts and emotions.

Unburdening the Bestial Soul.Description: Shares the vampire's own sense of moral peace of mind with another Kindred willing to repent of their sins.

Celestial Harmony.Description: Open your mind to the thoughts and emotions of a crowd

Cipher.Description: Gain the ability to read any non-supernatural language or code

Clairvoyance.Description: See what is happening in a distant location

Crocodile's Tongue.Description: Know what someone wants to hear in order to get the best reaction

Discern the Aura.Description: Scan a group of people with one particular trait in their aura

Eagle's Sight.Description: Gain a bird's eye view of your area

Genius Loci.Description: Gain insight by meditating at places of high resonance

Horoscopic Forecast.Description: Gain a glimpse of the target's future

Insight of the Talespinner.Description: Draw out detailed characters and stories quickly from your mind

Prediction.Description: Socially outwit someone by knowing what they are going to say ahead of time

Sense Emotion.Description: Learn the emotions of the people around you

Spirit Bond.Description: Create a connection to something so you can find its geographical location

The Dreaming.Description: Be somewhat aware of events concerning you while in torpor

The Mind Revealed.Description: Continuously read someone's thoughts to know what they are thinking and about to do

Anima Gathering.Description: Take other people with you to travel astrally

Ecstatic Agony.Description: The pain from wounds makes you act stronger

Melange.Description: See the truths behind reality in metaphor

Mirror Reflex.Description: React quickly to an opponent in combat by reading their mind

Personality Metamorph.Description: Take on fictitious personalities as your own

Pluck the Secret.Description: Learn what a target knows about a specific subject

Repression of the Obvious.Description: Learn about the most directly repressing thought a target has at the moment.

Spirit Link.Description: Speak with multiple people telepathically at once

Stealing the Mind's Eye.Description: See and hear what a target does and even use some Disciplines through them

Supernal Awareness.Description: Sense events and deeds anywhere in the world

Omniscience.Description: Learn the personalities and identities of all creatures around you

Psychic Assault.Description: Make a powerful mental attack against a target's psyche

The Call (Malkavian Madness Network).Description: a Malkavian-exclusive ability that enables the vampire to summon a clan gathering.

The Oracle's Sight.Description: Hear and see the thoughts of everyone around you

Master of the Dom.Description: Merge with a land and know everything that transpires on it while gaining power over the land and its residents

Precognition.Description: Gain some insight as to what may happen at a particular time and place

Sight of the Oracle.Description: Always know what is happening around you

Bloody Message.Description: This ritual allows the vampire to write a message in blood, unto a piece of paper, that will vanish once the recipient reads it.

Clinging of the Insect.Description: Gives the caster the ability to cling to walls like a spider.

Coax the Garden.Description: Allows the caster to manipulate plant life, to their defense.

Craft Bloodstone.Description: Creates a Bloodstone, a magical tracking device.

Dampen the Fear.Description: Temporarily subdues the caster's fear of fire.

Herd Ward.Description: This rituals allows the vampire to protect their herd, from poachers.

Letter Ward.Description: This ritual is used by Tremere, when they want to make sure the missives they send are protected.

Unseen Underground.Description: Turns the caster invisible for a time, when they are underground.

Wake with Evening's Freshness.Description: Allows the caster to freshly awaken from torpor during the day as if it were already evening.

Calling the Aura's Remnant.Description: Allowing the vampire to speak with a corpse's aura (not their ghost)

Communicate with Kindred Sire.Description: Creates a telepathic link between a childe and their sire.

Eyes of Babel.Description: The caster gains the ability to read and speak any language known by their target.

Illuminate the Trail of Prey.Description: Allows the caster to perceive the past whereabouts of an individual through a glowing trail.

Ishtar's Touch.Description: The caster turns a dose of their own vitae into a narcotic, 'truth-serum' like substance that leaves a victim more suggestible and vulnerable to mind-affecting Disciplines like Presence and Dominate.

Truth of Blood.Description: Creates a potion capable of discerning lies from truth in a statement.

Dagon's Call.Description: A Banu Haqim ritual that ruptures the blood vessels of a victim from afar who has previously came into contact with the caster's vitae.

Deflection of Wooden Doom.Description: Causes a stake about to pierce the heart to shatter.

Essence of Air.Description: Creates a potion that grants the user limited flight abilities.

Eyes of the Past.Description: Recalls events in the caster's mind about past events that took place in their location up to five years prior.

Fire in the Blood.Description: A non-lethal ranged version of Cauldron of Blood.

Firewalker.Description: The caster increases the target's resistance to fire.

Gentle Mind.Description: Increases the frenzy resistance of the target's mind.

Haunted House.Description: Causes a vampire haven to appear haunted.

Illusion of Peaceful Death.Description: Restores wounds on a corpse (at most half-unexsanguinated) to conceal evidence of an unnatural death.

Illusion of Perfection.Description: Conceals the caster's appearance into that of a nondescript individual, similar to the Obfuscate ability Mask of a Thousand Faces.

One with the Blade.Description: The caster enchants a dedicated weapon with immunity to rust and dulling almost as if it were a ghoul, as long as it remains within their possession. If stolen, it ages and becomes able to perform Aggravated damage on its original enchanter.

Sanguine Watcher.Description: Summons a rat familiar out of Kindred vitae.

Sleep of Judas.Description: Creates a drug that can incapacitate a kindred.

The Unseen Change.Description: Forces a Garou into their Lupus form.

Defense of the Sacred Haven.Description: Wards a haven against the sun itself.

Eyes of the Nighthawk.Description: Allows the caster to possess a carnivorous bird.

Incorporeal Passage.Description: Allows the caster to pass freely through solid objects and become immune to physical damage.

Innocence of the Child's Heart.Description: Conceals the caster's Kindred aura from Auspex.

Protean Curse.Description: Transforms the target into a bat.

Rending the Sweet Earth.Description: Reveals the presence of a Protean Earth Meld user.

Web of Hunger.Description: Web of Hunger is an extension of the Extinguish Vitae ritual (see Vampire p. 273). Instead of controlling a single person's vitae slowly and corrosively draining vitae from multiple targets.

Creatio Ignis.Description: Allows the caster to manipulate fire, and start fires at close range.

Eden's Bounty.Description: Allows to caster to drain blood from creatures within a nearby area.

Escape to True Sanctuary.Description: The caster creates two circles that act as a one-way portal from one point to another.

Heart of Stone.Description: Turns the caster's heart into stone, making them immune to stakes but completely numbs their sense of emotional and social awareness.

Shaft of Belated Dissolution.Description: Enchants a stake with enough power to kill a vampire upon contact with their heart.

The Ritual of Transferring the Soul.Description: The Ritual of Transferring the Soul is a 5th level combined Blood Sorcery ritual and Oblivion ceremony that requires two Kindred participants: one who knows the requisite level of Blood Sorcery, and another who is versed in Oblivion. It is possible for a single Kindred who possesses both Disciplines to perform the ritual alone.

A Taste for Blood.Description: By tasting a drop of blood, the user can discern certain basic traits of the one to whom it belongs

Shape of the Sanguine Sacrament.Description: Allows the vampire manipulate their (or someone else's) blood, to form intricated images, such as a simple message or a geometrical shape.

Extinguish Vitae.Description: The user can intentionally remove the unlife-giving properties of some of the Blood in another vampire, stoking their Hunger as the victim's inner reserves curdle into impotence

Blood of Potency.Description: The vampire can concentrate their Blood, increasing its potency temporarily

Scorpion's Touch.Description: The vampire can transmute some of their Blood into a paralyzing poison, capable of affecting mortals and vampires alike

Theft of Vitae.Description: Through mystical means, the vampire opens a wound in a major artery of a mortal victim, blood shooting out through the air in a stream toward the open mouth of the user.

Baal's Caress.Description: The vampire can transmute their Blood into an extremely aggressive poison, lethal to mortal and Kindred alike

Cauldron of Blood.Description: This gruesome power lets the user boil the blood of a victim in their own veins, causing massive damage and excruciating pain

Rapid Reflexes.Description: The vampire suffers no penalty to dodging gunfire without cover.

Fleetness.Description: The vampire can add their Celerity to non-combat Dexterity checks.

Blink.Description: The vampire can cross large distances and still take additional actions such as make an attack.

Traversal.Description: The vampire can run up walls or across water with a successful check.

Draught of Elegance.Description: The vampire can bestow their Celerity powers on those that drink her blood.

Unerring Aim.Description: Amalgam Auspex 2. The vampire can prevent their target from dodging or defending against the vampire's ranged attacks.

Lightning Strike.Description: The vampire can prevent their target from dodging or defending against the vampire's melee attacks.

Split Second.Description: The vampire can supercede the Storyteller's narration and perform an action that only requires a few seconds like get through a door before it closes, roll out of the way of an explosion etc.

Flawless Parry.Description: Make perfect defensive motions at the expense of taking no other action

Momentum.Description: Focus your Celerity into one instant, increasing your strength

Precision.Description: Enter a trance where you can operate with exceptionally fine manipulation

Projectile.Description: Throw objects with the speed of your Celerity

Quickness.Description: Expend a blood and gain yet another additional turn. All previous celerity levels are activated

Tireless Tread.Description: Run at 50 miles per hour for at least eight hours

Celerity Refinement.Description: Choose to spend vitae for Celerity as you need them, rather than declaring them beforehand

Flower of Death.Description: Use your Celerity to gain bonuses to attacking

Quickness.Description: Expend extra blood points to gain extra actions, at the cost of an unsoakable lethal damage level per action

Stutter-Step.Description: Use your Celerity to gain bonuses to defense

Physical Defiance.Description: Move so fast you defy gravity and kill mortals instantly as you pass through them

The Unseen Storm.Description: Move so fast you are truly invisible

Time out of Time.Description: React instantly to anything and move before anyone realizes what you have done

Zephyr.Description: Move so fast that you seem to defy gravity

Between the Ticks.Description: Expend a blood and a Willpower, you gain an automatic success on all attacks delivered to an opponent with less than advanced Celerity. You have an extra action against those with advanced Celerity. All attacks delivered by those with less than advanced Celerity are considered to be automatic failures. You can declare fair escape at any time

Paragon of Motion.Description: Perform most physical acts without fail

Cloud Memory.Description: The vampire can make the target forget the past few minutes.

Compel.Description: The vampire can issue a short sentence command to the target.

Dementation.Description: Amalgam Obfuscate 2. The vampire can trigger psychotic breaks or nervous breakdowns.

Domitor's Favor.Description: Makes it more difficult for a vampire's Blood Bonded thrall to act against them.

Mesmerize.Description: The vampire can issue a longer, more complicated command to the target.

Slavish Devotion.Description: The vampire can strengthen the mind of their dominated victims, against interference from other Kindred.

Submerged Directive.Description: The vampire can use Mesmerize to embed delayed or triggered commands.

The Forgetful Mind.Description: The vampire can rewrite previous memories in the target.

Ancestral Dominion.Description: The vampire can make their Kindred descendants to take actions on their behalf, without the need for eye contact and verbal communication.

Rationalize.Description: The vampire can make victims of their Dominate powers internalize the commands and not realize they were compelled.

Mass Manipulation.Description: The vampire can amplify their other Dominate abilities to affect greater numbers at the same time.

Terminal Decree.Description: The vampire can now issue commands that are deadly or harmful to their targets.

Chain the Psyche.Description: Attempting to circumvent your Dominate commands fills the target with incapacitating pain

Command Obedience.Description: You no longer require eye contact for Dominate, relying on skin contact or your voice

Fealty.Description: Enforce oaths a target makes to you so they cannot be broken

Implanted Opinion.Description: Implant a feeling, opinion, or even a personality trait the victim will believe is their own

Loyalty.Description: It becomes very difficult for other vampires to override your Dominate commands with their own

Memory Block.Description: Leave a target unable to talk about a memory even while able to remember it

Obedience.Description: The vampire may use any Dominate power without eye contact. Touching their skin, or even clothing, is sufficient.

Oberon's Grail.Description: Erase entire nights of a target's memory

Rationalize.Description: Those you Dominate refuse to believe their actions are not their own

Tranquility.Description: Ease a vampire out of Frenzy

Chain of Command.Description: Should a target be made unable to obey one of your Dominate command the effect will be passed to one who can

Dynastic Power.Description: Control mortal descendants and implant suggestions using just a name or picture of the target

Mass Manipulation.Description: You can use Dominate on small groups at once

Repression of the Obvious.Description: Learn a thought the target is repressing and make them blurt it out

Still the Mortal Flesh.Description: Shut down the body functions of a target

Strings of the Marionette.Description: Force a vampire to obey your commands even when staked or in torpor

Tyrant's Gaze.Description: Reduce the Attributes of a target with a look

Carry the Master's Voice.Description: Make it so you can issue Dominate commands through a thrall

Far Mastery.Description: You can issue Dominate commands to someone you know anywhere in the world if you know their location

Best Intentions.Description: Make a target always act with your best intentions in mind

Speak Through the Blood.Description: Guide the actions of your vampiric descendants over the years

Puppet Master.Description: Override a target's mind completely and make them think and act as you. This power may only be attempted once per year on a given victim.

Unswayable Mind.Description: The vampire can add their Fortitude rating to dice rolls to resist manipulation and coercion.

Enduring Beasts.Description: The vampire can extend their Fortitude powers to animals under the effect of their Animalism.

Obdurate.Description: By shoring up their physical hardiness with vampiric Potence, the Kindred may maintain a steady footing when struck by a massive force.

Toughness.Description: The vampire can subtract Fortitude rating from all Superficial damage sustained.

Valeren.Description: Projects Fortitude outwardly, willing the vampire's Blood to mend another vampire's injuries.

Defy Bane.Description: The vampire can downgrade Aggravated damage into Superficial damage.

Fortify the Inner Facade.Description: The vampire can use their Fortitude to resist the Auspex powers of Scry Soul and Telepathy.

Draught of Endurance.Description: The vampire can bestow their Fortitude abilities onto those who drink their blood.

Shatter.Description: The vampire becomes so tough, that they repel close combat blows, to the point where weapons break and bones shatter. Requirement: Toughness.

Flesh of Marble.Description: The vampire can ignore the first source of damage each turn, including Fire but not Sunlight.

Prowess of Pain.Description: The vampire can ignore penalties to dice pools from injury.

Personal Armor.Description: Weapons that hit you may break

Sensory Shield.Description: Protect your mind from sensory overload and suffer less wound penalties

Stand Against All Foes.Description: Cannot be moved from your spot by any force

Armor of Kings.Description: Weapons that hit you may break, doing no damage

Curse the Laurel.Description: Slowly move stakes from your heart

Resilient Mind.Description: Your mind sheds derangements and animalistic quirks while becoming resistant to mind-altering powers

Shared Strength.Description: Grant your supernatural resilience to another

Adamantine.Description: Weapons that hit you may break, doing no damage

Armored Flesh.Description: Suffer no damage outside of combat, and block attacks with your bare hands.

Eternal Vigilance.Description: Remain awake during the day almost at full strength

King of the Mountain.Description: Take no actions but fully blocking attacks, breaking weapons that you stop

Repair the Undead Flesh.Description: Heal aggravated damage without need of rest

Arm of Prometheus.Description: Make one of your limbs completely indestructible for 10 minutes

Cloak of Shadows.Description: The vampire can become invisible while standing motionless.

Silence of Death.Description: The vampire can nullify all sound that they make.

Chimerstry.Description: The vampire can create brief, but vivid single-sensory hallucinations.

Unseen Passage.Description: The vampire can move around while staying invisible.

Fata Morgana.Description: The vampire can craft elaborate multisensory hallucinations.

Ghost in the Machine.Description: Other Obfuscate powers work on electronic recording devices.

Mask of a Thousand Faces.Description: The vampire can assume the voice and appearance of a generic person who blends in the current setting, i.e. a worker in a factory or a nightwatchman in an office.

Mental Maze[4].Description: The Vampire can make the victim unable to escape the building, leaving him feeling that the building folds back on itself.

Conceal.Description: Amalgam of Auspex 3. The vampire can cloak an inaminate object up to a small building from sight.

Vanish.Required_skill: Cloak of Shadows. The vampire can activate Cloak of Shadows or Unseen Passage even under direct observation.

Cloak the Gathering.Description: The vampire can Obfuscate their companions.

Imposter's Guise.Description: The vampire can disguise themselves as a specific person.

Busy Doing Nothing.Description: Makes you appear to be doing nothing

Conceal.Description: Hide an object independent of you up to the size of a house

Confusion of the Eye.Description: Make a target mentally view someone else differently as with Mask of a Thousand Faces without making any visible signs to others

Diastatsis.Description: Lets the user fade away and replace themselves with an illusionary self they can control

Displacement.Description: Appear to be shifted a little to one side

Gemini's Mirror.Description: Move around invisible while an image of you continues to act normally

Invisible Weapon.Description: Hide a weapon so that it cannot be seen even when you are attacking with it

Manifold Guise.Description: Make everyone in an area look like someone else as with Mask of a Thousand Faces, whether they want to or not

Mask of Janus.Description: Exchange your appearance as with Mask of a Thousand Faces with someone else

Mental Maze.Description: Make someone unable to find their way out of an area

Mind Blank.Description: Protect your mind from attempts to read it

Scrawl.Description: Hide messages in writing legible only to an intended viewer

Soul Mask.Description: Disguise your aura to appear differently or not at all

Cache.Description: Extend an Obfuscate power so that it continues after you have left the area

Cloak.Description: Hide yourself from Auspex powers searching for you

Fortress of Silence.Description: Cut any noises off, allowing clarity of thought and heightened awareness of self, or use on a target to drive it mad with the sound of its own heartbeat

Veil of Blissful Ignorance.Description: Make it so no one will see a person no matter what he does

Veil the Legions.Description: Hide a small army from a distance

Horrid Countenance.Description: Take on the appearance of a monstrous entity that every person sees as their personal nightmare

Old Friend.Description: Make someone view you as a trusted friend and confidant

Phantom Haunter.Description: Take on the visage of a figure that haunts and terrifies the target

Create Name.Description: Create a whole new identity for yourself that overcomes any suspicions

Obscure God's Creation.Description: Remove a person or object from another's perceptions

Summon Spirit.Description: This Ceremony enables a vampire to summon a spirit from the Underworld.

The Knowing Stone.Description: This Ceremony lets the necromancer to identify the locations and existences of specific ghosts.[3]

Traveller's Call.Description: This Ceremony enables a priest of Shalim to send a ripple across Oblivion and alert another Shalimite that they wish to meet, and where.

Awaken the Homuncular Servant.Description: Necromancers use this Ceremony to create spies and stalkers out of body parts such as hands or skulls, or small dead animals like rats or foxes.

Compel Spirit.Description: This Ceremony allows a vampire to bend a wraith to their will.

Host Spirit.Description: This Ceremony allows a vampire to open their body to possession by a ghost.

Name of the Father.Description: This Ceremony enables a Shalimite vampire to shroud the mind of a victim in shadow, paralysing them and rendering them numb to all sensory input except touch.

Shambling Hordes.Description: This Ceremony enables a necromancer to raise a group of aggressive, walking dead minions.

Bind the Spirit.Description: Vampires with access to this Ceremony have the ability to bind wraiths to specified locations and people.

Split the Shroud.Description: This Ceremony allows a vampire to create a tear in the Shroud through which wraiths can pass and vampires with the correct Ceremonies can physically enter the Shadowlands.

Ex Nihilo.Description: This Ceremony enables a vampire and their coterie to migrate into the Shadowlands, though doing so comes at great risk.

Lazarene Blessing.Description: This Ceremony enables a necromancer to bring a freshly-dead body back to life, though not how its relatives and friends might remember it.

Pit of Contemplation.Description: This Ceremony enables a Shalimite vampire to cast a victim into Oblivion itself. Mortals expire immediately, but Kindred are trapped in the endless void forever, unless somebody sees fit to reverse the Ceremony and retrieve them.

Ashes to Ashes.Description: The vampire may disintegrate non-Kindred corpses with their vitae, including animated cadavers like those brought to false life with Oblivion.

Oblivion's Sight.Description: The vampire's irises become black against the white of their sclera. They ignore all darkness penalties, even those brought on by supernatural darkness, and can see ghosts.

The Binding Fetter.Description: The vampire can identify objects and locations important to ghosts by a faint aura.

Arms of Ahriman.Description: The vampire summons two-dimensional shadow tendrils which glide across surfaces and victims, alternatively engaging in mystical grapples with the victim's shadow. They attack using the vampire's Wits and Oblivion, benefiting from their Potence when inflicting damage. Multiple tendrils can be created by splitting the vampire's dice pool. Amalgam with Potence 2.

Fatal Precognition.Description: The vampire's eyes become black and they remain still while they scry a vision which shows the death of a non-Kindred they can percieve. Attempts to subvert the fate seen in the vision become more difficult. Amalgam with Auspex 2.

Shadow Cast.Description: The vampire summons a supernatural shadow from Oblivion, one which they control and can only be destroyed by sunlight. It allows them to use other Oblivion powers through it despite the presence of light, and casting it on somebody during social conflict intensifies the Willpower damage that victim suffers.

Where the Shroud Thins.Description: The vampire determines the density of the local Shroud, learning whether ghosts (and Kindred with the right Ceremony) may cross between worlds here, how difficult uses of Oblivion are, and whether mortals are at risk. They do not learn the cause of the Shroud's condition, simply what it is.

Aura of Decay.Description: The vampire's connection to Oblivion manifests as an aura which spoils food, poisons water, wears down structures, and kills living things with their mere presence.

Passion Feast.Description: The vampire has developed the startling ability to consume the raw emotions of wraiths to temporarily sate their hunger, eroding the ghost's reason for being with their foul gluttony. Amalgam with Fortitude 2.

Shadow Perspective.Description: The vampire casts their senses to a shadow they can see, maintaining both their mundane senses and their shadow perspective. This eavesdropping cannot be detected without supernatural means, such as Sense the Unseen from Auspex.

Touch of Oblivion.Description: The vampire touches their victim and channels the raw entropic power of Oblivion through them. The victim suffers aggravated damage, and a crippling injury (blindness, muteness, a ruined limb, or the like).

Necrotic Plague.Description: With a touch, the vampire may poison a mortal's blood using the pure pollutant of Oblivion. This horrific disease ravages their body and risks becoming contagious.

Stygian Shroud.Description: The vampire spreads a suffocating darkness across a large area, muting sound and suppressing all other senses. Those within the shroud (except the user) suffer a total blindness penalty on all actions requiring sight, and mortals suffocate.

Shadow Step.Description: The vampire disappears into shadow, skating across the Labyrinth to reemerge after travelling across something fouler than death and twice as hungry. They step into a shadow large enough to cover them, and reemerge from one they can see. This includes shadows viewed through mystical means, such as Shadow Perspective.

Skuld Fulfilled.Description: The vampire coats their palms and face with blood, recalling the faces of their victims and reintroducing old illnesses with new fury. Ghouls who fall victim to this power feel the vitae in their veins become inert, aging and possibly dying.

Tenebrous Avatar.Description: The vampire becomes a sentient patch of two-dimensional darkness, immune to damage except fire and sunlight. While in this shadow state they can pass through anything not hermetically sealed, are immune to most harms as described above, and can envelop others to feed without breaking the skin. Those enveloped by a vampire using Tenebrous Avatar suffer the effects of Stygian Shroud.

Withering Spirit.Description: The vampire coats both of their hands in vitae, and touches a victim. Channeling raw entropy, they decay the spirit, causing severe damage and possibly preventing the victim's return as a wraith if they are obliterated.

Lethal Body.Description: The Kindred can cause serious physical damage to a mortal, capable of tearing skin and breaking bone.

Soaring Leap.Description: The Kindred can leap higher and further.

Prowess.Description: The Kindred gains an overall increase in strength.

Brutal Feed.Description: The Kindred is given such strength in feeding as to be able to completely exsanguinate a mortal human within a matter of seconds.

Spark of Rage.Description: A combination of both Potence and Presence, the Kindred can incite anger or even frenzy in any onlookers.

Uncanny Grip.Description: The Kindred is able to grip onto nearly any surface, and climb and hang unsupported from walls and ceilings.

Draught of Might.Description: The Kindred's blood can serve as a strength potion to anyone who drinks of it; friend or foe alike.

Earthshock.Description: The Kindred can slam their fist or foot into the ground to cause a forceful shockwave to knock their adversaries prone.

Fist of Caine.Description: The Kindred's bare hands are capable of causing devastating or lethal injuries to both mortals and other Kindred alike.

Crush.Description: The Kindred with a successful attack against an object automatically destroys it.

Master of the Forge.Description: The Kindred creates exceptional metalwork tools and weapons.

Relentless Pursuit.Description: The Kindred makes extraordinary leaps through the air.

The Fist of Caine.Description: The Kindred makes brawling attacks from a few yards away.

The Gentle Rebuke.Description: The Kindred telekinetically knocks someone away without harming them.

Brutality.Description: The Kindred is able to deal lethal damage with their unarmed strikes.

Earthshock.Description: The Kindred sends shockwaves through the Earth.

Fist of the Titans.Description: The Kindred attacks or throws someone away telekinetically.

Immovable Object.Description: Spend a Willpower point while standing on a solid surface to become absolutely immovable.

The Forger's Hammer.Description: The Kindred creates weapons that do extra damage.

Aftershock.Description: Delay damage from attacks for up to 24 hours.

Flick.Description: The Kindred makes a simple motion that sends a target flying away.

Lend the Supernatural Vigor.Description: The Kindred grants their incredible strength to another.

Touch of Pain.Description: The Kindred puts the full force of their strength against one person or object.

Might of the Heroes.Description: The Kindred performs physical feats of mythic proportion.

Awe.Description: The vampire can add their Presence rating to their Persuasion and Performance checks

Daunt.Description: The vampire can add their Presence rating to their Intimidation checks.

Eyes of the Serpent.Description: Amalgam Protean 1.  The vampire can freeze a mortal in place with their gaze.

Lingering Kiss.Description: The vampire can gain bonuses to their Social pools against targets that they have Kissed.

Dread Gaze.Description: The vampire can inflict terror in their target.

Entrancement.Description: The vampire can add their Presence rating to all Social pools and make small requests of the target.

True Love's Face.Description: Combining Presence with Obfuscate, the vampire can take the appearance of someone their victim loves.

Irresistible Voice.Description: Amalgam Dominate 1. The vampire can now use Dominate powers with their voice alone.

Magnum Opus.Description: Amalgam Auspex 3. When the vampire creates a work of art (ex: painting, sculpture), they can impart on to their work a portion of their Presence, making the audience succumb to it's hypnotic allure or fear it's dreadful visage.

Summon.Description: The Vampire may summon anyone that has been under the influence of their Awe, Entrancement or Tasted the user's Blood.

Majesty.Description: The vampire can make everyone in their presence unable to act in conflict against them.

Star Magnetism.Description: Awe, Daunt, and Entrancement can be used through live feeds and electronic streams.

Capture Reality.Description: Project the essence of a scene through photographs or film

Force of Personality.Description: People are forced away from you by your aura

Intensification.Description: Create an object that instills a particular emotion in those who view it

Love.Description: Make someone enamored with you as if in a blood bond

Paralyzing Glance.Description: Send someone into a seizure of terror

Passion.Description: Fill a person or group with lust, greed, anger, or fear

Renew the Earthly Pleasures.Description: Overwhelm a vampire with mortal feelings

Siren's Song.Description: Instill particular emotions in a group through music

Spark of Rage.Description: Provoke a group of people to Frenzy

Star Magnetism.Description: Make those who see you in pictures or films in awe of you

Two-Tiered Communication.Description: Subliminally say different things to someone than what is heard publically

Vengeance of the Martyr's Legacy.Description: Compel all the vampire's descendants Frenzy

Cooperation.Description: Lessen hostilities and promote cooperation in a group

Fires of Conviction.Description: Embolden a crowd to riot in the name of some cause

Mind Numb.Description: Drain the people around you of motivation or incentive to act

Phobia.Description: Make someone irrationally afraid of something

Scourging the Instinct.Description: Whip a crowd into a controlled frenzy

Unholy Penance.Description: Fill someone with guilt and the desire to beg forgiveness

Vengeance of the Martyr's Legacy.Description: Force all the vampire's descendants to Frenzy

Bloodlust.Description: Rouse your troops into an enraged horde capable of ignoring their wounds

Corruption.Description: Make someone addicted to sadistic acts or go into a Frenzy when presented with pleasurable things

Invoke Frenzy.Description: Send someone into one of three types of Frenzy

Ironclad Command.Description: It becomes very difficult to resist your Presence powers

Perfect Paragon.Description: Appear as the ideal person to whomever sees you

A Perfect World.Description: Make everyone in a city work towards making it your ideal city

Pulse of the City.Description: Project an emotion into the residents of a city

Dream World.Description: Project dreams and nightmares to everyone in the world

Eyes of the Beast.Description: The vampire can will a supernatural red gleam into their eyes, giving them sight even in the total absence of light.

Weight of the Feather.Description: The vampire can reduce their effective mass and density, making themselves almost weightless. This allows them to avoid triggering pressure sensors as well as avoiding major damage from falls, collisions, or being thrown. The power cannot be used for longer leaps, as the vampire's strength is proportionally reduced.

Feral Weapons.Description: The vampire can extend their natural weapons to monstrous proportions. This usually takes the form of fingernails extending into wicked talons but can also come in other forms such as fangs elongating into veritable daggers, as from a gigantic serpent.

Vicissitude.Description: The vampire reshapes one's own skin, muscles, and bone at will.

Earth Meld.Description: Becoming one with the soil, the vampire sinks into the earth. Unless in torpor, the vampire rises again the following night.

Fleshcrafting.Description: Reshape the physical form of others.

Shapechange.Description: The vampire can assume the shape of an animal roughly the same size as their original mass. The vampire can only change into one type of animal (usually a wolf, sometimes a large feline or a giant snake), usually one associated with their clan or the type of prey they most commonly feed on. The animal, while usually a spectacular example of their species, shows no signs to a mundane observer of being supernatural.

Horrid Form.Description: The vampires takes on a truly monstrous form.

Metamorphosis.Description: This power grants an additional animal form to the user, this time also enabling them to change their size. Vampires most commonly metamorphose into bats, rats, unusually large insects, or snakes.

Mist Form.Description: The vampire gains the legendary power to turn into a cloud of mist, perceivable to the eye but untouchable by anything save fire, sunlight, and supernatural aggression. They can fit through pipes, crevices, and cracks. While strong winds might buffet them, no natural force can disperse the cloud.

One with the Land.Description: While melded to the earth, the vampire takes on a preternatural awareness of people, creatures, things, and events across the domain.

The Heart of Darkness.Description: this power enables a vampire to remove their own heart and store it outside their body. For as long as it is removed, the vampire is immune to staking attempts, unless a stake is driven through the removed heart.

The Unfettered Heart.Description: Having mastered the power of Protean, the very insides of the user become malleable, almost viscous. The heart, seat of the vitae and unlife of the vampire, detaches and moves freely, if sluggishly, within the chest. This makes the vampire exceedingly hard to stake as the position of their heart changes nightly, and can even allow the user to free themselves from paralysis.

Adaptation.Description: Adapt oneself to avoid harm from the vampire's environment

Blissful Slumber.Description: Hibernate during the day as nearly indestructible mist

Flesh of Marble.Description: Damage from physical attacks is halved

Loki's Gift.Description: Change into the shape of a creature whose blood you have tasted

Shape Mastery.Description: Cause shapeshifters to revert to their natural form

Smoke and Mirrors.Description: When attacked, turn into mist instantly

Animal Swarm.Description: Transform into a swarm of small creatures

Homunculus.Description: Create a miniature version of yourself to act as a servant

Restore the Mortal Visage.Description: Temporarily appear as one did while mortal

Shape of the Beast's Wrath.Description: Transform into a powerful man-beast abomination

Spectral Body.Description: Become incorporeal while retaining one's forms and nonphysical abilities

Turnabout.Description: Quickly change positions by moving through the earth

Movement of the Slowed Body.Description: Very slowly move while in torpor

Mythic Form.Description: Transform into a specific mythic creature

Purify the Impaled Breast.Description: Violently expel foreign objects from your body, including stakes

Shape of the Inner Beast.Description: Enter Frenzy and transform into a monstrous killing machine

Adaptation.Description: Your body instinctively shifts to provide maximum protection

Draught of Phoenix Blood.Description: A number of days equal to the vampire's generation after Final Death, they will reincarnate in a new body, one generation higher, retaining this power but with an incomplete picture of who they were and losing any other Attributes, Abilities, Backgrounds, and Disciplines above the new generational trait cap.

Dual Form.Description: Split into two weaker versions of oneself

Body of the Sun.Description: Transform your body into blazing indestructible fire

Counterfeit level 1.Description: User can develop a cointerfit level 1 discipline

Chemically Induced Flashback.Description: By melting down a deceased vampire's possessions, the alchemist can gain access to the vampire's memories through Ashe Prerequisite: Concoct Ashe[1]

Concoct Ashe.Description: Concoct the substance Ashe, which can temporarily increase the Blood Potency of a thin-blooded vampire, but can create addiction[1]

Defractionate.Description: Makes fresh blood out of bagged medical blood

Profane Hieros Gamos.Description: User can change their gender or appearance

Counterfeit level 2.Description: User can develop a cointerfit level 2 discipline

Discipline Channeling.Description: Through Ashe, the thin-blood can gain access to one of the deceased vampire's disciplines, even though it is too high for the standard counterfeit disciplines Prerequisite: Concoct Ashe[1]

Counterfeit level 3.Description: User can develop a cointerfit level 3 discipline

Awaken the Sleeper.Description: User can awake other vampires from torpor

Counterfeit level 4.Description: User can develop a cointerfit level 4 discipline
